La_Habra.STAGEStheatre:
STAGEStheatre is a 501(c)3 non-profit theatre located in Fullerton, California. It is the oldest storefront theatre in Orange County, and has mounted hundreds of productions, including American classics, comedies, dramas, Shakespeare, absurdist, avant-garde, experimental and original plays.


== History ==
STAGEStheatre was founded in 1992 by Brian Kojac.
